description: This file contains a Playwright test suite for the Board Layout component of the application, verifying default board load and initial UI state.

methods.name: test.describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite grouping related tests for the Board Layout component.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines an individual test case, here verifying that the default board loads correctly.

methods.name: test.step
methods.description: Creates a step within a test case for better organization and reporting.

methods.name: page.goto
methods.description: Navigates the browser to the specified URL.

methods.name: page.locator
methods.description: Finds elements in the DOM matching the specified selector.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Performs assertions on located elements, such as visibility, count, and text presence.
